import math
for i in range(int(input())):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    d = max(a, b)
    e = min(a, b)
    c = math.ceil((d - e) / 2)
    print(c)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (x, y) = map(int, input().split())
    lb = min(x, y)
    ub = max(x, y)
    q = abs(x - y)
    for j in range(lb, ub + 1):
        k = max(abs(x - j), abs(y - j))
        if q > k:
            q = k
    print(q)

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    (a, b) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    res = (a + b) // 2
    res1 = max(a, b)
    res2 = res1 - res
    print(res2)

import math
for t in range(int(input())):
    (chef_position, chefina_position) = map(int, input().split())
    difference = chef_position - chefina_position
    temp = math.fabs(difference) // 2
    if math.fabs(difference) % 2 == 0:
        print(int(temp))
        pass
    else:
        print(int(temp + 1))
        pass

import math
T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    (X, Y) = map(int, input().split())
    result = math.floor((X + Y) / 2)
    ans = max(X, Y)
    print(int(abs(ans - result)))

import math
T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (X, Y) = map(int, input().split())
    midpoint = (X + Y) / 2
    result_floordiv = (X + Y) // 2
    if midpoint == result_floordiv:
        Z = result_floordiv
    elif midpoint != result_floordiv:
        Z = int(math.ceil(midpoint))
    distX = abs(X - Z)
    distY = abs(Y - Z)
    print(max(distX, distY))

from math import ceil
T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (X, Y) = map(int, input().split())
    Z = (X + Y) / 2
    print(ceil(max(abs(X - Z), abs(Y - Z))))
